channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Jena
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Jena

item.title: CVE-2023-22665|2023-04-25T08:20:15.873Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20jena
item.description: There is insufficient checking of user queries in Apache Jena versions 4.7.0 and earlier, when invoking custom scripts. It allows a remote user to execute arbitrary javascript via a SPARQL query.

item.title: CVE-2023-32200|2023-07-12T07:49:55.432Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20jena
item.description: There is insufficient restrictions of called script functions in Apache Jena versions 4.8.0 and earlier. It allows a remote user to execute javascript via a SPARQL query. This issue affects Apache Jena: from 3.7.0 through 4.8.0.
